#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        vector<int> v(n);
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
          scanf("%d",&(v[i]));
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        printf("%d\n",v[n-m]);
    }
    return 0;
}
